variable.name: INVSITE
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the site (for internal use)

variable.name: INV
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the investigator (for internal use)

variable.name: GS1
variable.description: I feel close to my friends
variable.comment: FAMS - FAMILY/SOCIAL WELL-BEING By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: GS2
variable.description: I get emotional support from my family
variable.comment: FAMS - FAMILY/SOCIAL WELL-BEING By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.description: I get support from my friends
variable.comment: FAMS - FAMILY/SOCIAL WELL-BEING By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.comment: FAMS - FAMILY/SOCIAL WELL-BEING By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.

variable.name: MS13
variable.description: My family has trouble understanding when my condition gets worse
